title: Maus: A Survivor's Tale - Hardcover Edition
description: 'Maus: A Survivor's Tale' by Art Spiegelman is a profound graphic novel presented here in a high-quality hardcover edition. This Pulitzer Prize-winning work uses a powerful metaphor of mice and cats to recount the author's father's experiences during the Holocaust. With its stark black-and-white illustrations and deeply emotional narrative, this edition offers readers a chance to explore the historical and personal dimensions of this tragic period. The hardcover format provides a durable and elegant way to experience this groundbreaking work.
